name: NBA's Top 10 Plays Of The Night | December 21, 2023
author: NBA
description: Never miss a moment with the latest news, trending stories and highlights to bring you closer to your favorite players and teams. Download now ➡ https://app.link.nba.com/NBAapp  Subscribe to the NBA: https://on.nba.com/2JX5gSN

name: Final 4:44 CLOSE ENDING Wizards vs Trail Blazers | December 21, 2023
author: NBA
description: The Washington Wizards defeated the Portland Trail Blazers, 118-117. Kyle Kuzma led Washington with 32 points, 8 rebounds, and 6 assists as Tyus Jones (season-high 24 points) and Daniel Gafford (16 points, 8 rebounds, 4 steals, 6 blocks) totaled 40 points. Anfernee Simons led the Blazers with a season-high 41 points (22 points, 5-7 3PT in the fourth quarter) and 7 assists as Deandre Ayton added 23 points and 16 rebounds. The Wizards improve to 5-22 as the Blazers move to 7-19.

name: WIZARDS at TRAIL BLAZERS | FULL GAME HIGHLIGHTS | December 21, 2023
author: NBA
description: The Washington Wizards defeated the Portland Trail Blazers, 118-117. Kyle Kuzma led Washington with 32 points, 8 rebounds, and 6 assists as Tyus Jones (season-high 24 points) and Daniel Gafford (16 points, 8 rebounds, 4 steals, 6 blocks) totaled 40 points. Anfernee Simons led the Blazers with a season-high 41 points (22 points, 5-7 3PT in the fourth quarter) and 7 assists as Deandre Ayton added 23 points and 16 rebounds. The Wizards improve to 5-22 as the Blazers move to 7-20.

name: LAKERS at TIMBERWOLVES | FULL GAME HIGHLIGHTS | December 21, 2023
author: NBA
description: The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves, 118-111. Anthony Edwards led Minnesota with 27 points, 7 rebounds, and 5 assists as Karl-Anthony Towns (21 points, 6 rebounds, 4 assists) and Rudy Gobert (15 points, 13 rebounds) totaled 36 points. Anthony Davis led the Lakers with 31 points, 8 rebounds, 4 assists, and 3 blocks while Austin Reaves added 20 points, 7 rebounds, and 5 assists.  The Timberwolves improve to 21-6 as the Lakers move to 15-14.

name: Giannis Antetokounmpo Leads The Way In DOUBLE-DOUBLE Performance! 👏 | December 21, 2023
author: NBA
description: The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Orlando Magic, 118-114. Giannis Antetokounmpo tallied his tenth 35+ point game of the year with 37 points, 10 rebounds, and 6 assists. The Bucks win their sixth in a row to improve to 21-7 on the year and the Magic have now lost four in a row and move to 16-11.

name: MAGIC at BUCKS | FULL GAME HIGHLIGHTS | December 21, 2023
author: NBA
description: The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Orlando Magic, 118-114. Giannis Antetokounmpo tallied his tenth 35+ point game of the year with 37 points, 10 rebounds, and 6 assists as Damian Lillard added 24 points, 5 rebounds, and 8 assists. Franz Wagner (29 points, 6 rebounds, 6 assists) and Paolo Banchero (23 points, 7 rebounds, 4 assists) led Orlando. The Bucks win their sixth in a row to improve to 21-7 on the year and the Magic have now lost four in a row and move to 16-11.

name: PACERS at GRIZZLIES | FULL GAME HIGHLIGHTS | December 21, 2023
author: NBA
description: Desmond Bane led Memphis with 31 points, 7 assists, and 6 rebounds as the Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Indiana Pacers, 116-103. Jaren Jackson Jr. (21 points, 8 rebounds) and Ja Morant (20 points, 5 rebounds, 8 assists) led Memphis as Obi Toppin (22 points) and Tyrese Haliburton (17 points, 14 assists) led Indiana. The Grizzlies improve to 8-19 as the Pacers move to 14-13.

name: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander Gets BUCKETS vs Clippers! 🔥 | December 21, 2023
author: NBA
description: The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the LA Clippers, 134-115. Shai Gilgeous-Alexander led Oklahoma City with 31 points, 8 rebounds, 4 assists, and 4 steals. The Thunder win their third in a row, snap the Clippers 9-game win streak as they improve to 18-8 as the Clippers move to 17-11.  With 31 points and 4 steals tonight, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander becomes the third player to record 750 points and 70 steals through the first 25 games of a season: Michael Jordan – 2x (1988-89, 1987-88) Rick Barry – 1x (1974-75)

name: CLIPPERS at THUNDER | FULL GAME HIGHLIGHTS | December 21, 2023
author: NBA
description: The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the LA Clippers, 134-115. Shai Gilgeous-Alexander led Oklahoma City with 31 points, 8 rebounds, 4 assists, and 4 steals as Chet Holmgren added 23 points (9-11 FG), 6 rebounds, and 7 assists. James Harden (23 points, 9 rebounds, 6 assists) and Paul George (22 points, 4 rebounds, 4 assists) led the Clippers as Russell Westbrook added 15 points and 13 rebounds. The Thunder win their third in a row, snap the Clippers 9-game win streak as they improve to 18-8 as the Clippers move to 17-11.  With 31 points and 4 steals tonight, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander becomes the third player to record 750 points and 70 steals through the first 25 games of a season: Michael Jordan – 2x (1988-89, 1987-88) Rick Barry – 1x (1974-75)

name: SPURS at BULLS | FULL GAME HIGHLIGHTS | December 21, 2023
author: NBA
description: The Chicago Bulls defeated the San Antonio Spurs, 114-95. Coby White led the Bulls with 22 points (10-15 FG), 6 rebounds, and 5 assists as DeMar DeRozan totaled 21 points, 4 rebounds, and 5 assists. Devin Vassell led San Antonio with 21 points while Zach Collins added 14 points, 9 rebounds, and 3 blocks. The Bulls have won three in a row and improve to 13-17 as the Spurs move to 4-23.

name: Chet Holmgren throws up the alley-oop to HIMSELF! 🔥🤯 | #Shorts
author: NBA

name: PELICANS at CAVALIERS | FULL GAME HIGHLIGHTS | December 21, 2023
author: NBA
description: The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers, 123-104. Trey Murphy III led New Orleans with a season-high in points (28) along with 6 3-pointers, 4 rebounds and 3 assists as CJ McCollum added 18 points, 6 rebounds, 4 assists, and 4 steals. Dean Wade led Cleveland with 20 points (6-8 3PT) and 9 rebounds while Craig Porter Jr. added 7 points and a career-high 11 assists. The Pelicans improve to 17-12 as the Cavaliers move to 16-13.
